dict.acceptation: 经过，过去；在侧，在附近；短暂拜访；

sent.orig: The strain BX-2(Bacillus subtilis) was matagenized by ultraviolet light and DES, a high-D-ribose-producing strain(BY-5) was obtained.
sent.trans: 通过对菌株BX-2(Bacillussubtilis)的紫外诱变和硫酸二乙酯的诱变处理得到D-核糖高产菌株BY-5。

sent.orig: Many of our N?by products have attained prestigious awards for design, function and market excellence.
sent.trans: 许多N?by?的产品是获得设计，功能和市场的声望很高的奖项。

sent.orig: Our BY disc-type hulling machine features extensive applications and is mainly used for hulling of cottonseeds.
sent.trans: 本厂生产BY型圆盘式剥壳机，使用范围广，通常用于棉籽的剥壳。

sent.orig: For example, code with an off-by-one error fails only when you exercise a boundary.
sent.trans: 例如，对于“大小差一”(off-by-one)错误的代码，只有当你执行边界测试时才会失败。

sent.orig: ﻿Happiness is the man who is living by his hobby.
sent.trans: 醉心于某种癖好的人是幸福的。
